titleStmt.title: An act declaring what offences shall be adjudged treason.
Laws, etc.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

titleStmt.title: An act declaring what offences shall be adjudged treason.
Laws, etc.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

notesStmt.note: The last word of first line of text: 'Parliament'; first word of line below initial: 'presentatives'; last word of last full line of text: 'pur-'.

Also issued as part of a through-paged folio set with a table for the entire set added and as part of "An act prohibiting the proclaiming of any person to be King" London, printed by John Field for Edward Husband, 1649.
Caption ornament; initial letter; text in black letter.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
